mapper.select: select * from(select t.*, rownum rn from(select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc) t ) where rn between #{cri.startNo} and #{cri.endNo} order by rn
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply=#{reply}, updateDate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
